name: It Could Be Raining
description:
It Could Be Raining is a humorous game about robbing graves to make some extra money on the side. Dig up such famous folks as Duke and Duchess Dingus and plunder their riches for your own reward.  But bewarb  folks, BEWARB I SAY not everything is worth something so you'll have to sort through the trash to find your treasure. 

Here is the link to play this card game digitally on Playing Cards.io, The rules are available for download below! 

Playing Cards.io Link: https://playingcards.io/77sde3
